title: A dyall for dainty darlings, rockt in the cradle of securitie A glasse for all disobedient sonnes to looke in. A myrrour for vertuous maydes. A booke right excellent, garnished with many woorthy examples, and learned aucthorities, most needefull for this tyme present. Compiled by VV. Auerell, Student in Diuinitie, and Schoolemaister in London.
author: Averell, W. (William)
publicationStmtPublisher: [J. Charlewood] for Thomas Hackette, and are to be solde at his shoppe in Lumbert Streete, vnder the Popes head,
